submissions.title: Village fete
submissions.location: Taffeta Farmhouse (where the pig pen used to be)
submissions.description: We're hiring a pizza van, some carnival games and setting up some hay bales round our beautiful fire pits. Family friendly. Mulled wine for adults, soft drinks for the kiddies!

submissions.name: Mama Rose's Cafe
submissions.description: You won't believe the things these people do to muffins.
